MyStore
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PruductService } from '../service/pruduct.service'; import { IProduct } from '../interface/product'; import { MenuItem } from 'primeng/api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { items: MenuItem[] = []; searchValue: string = ""; cartCountChange: number = 0; constructor(private productService: PruductService) {} ngOnInit() { this.items = [ { label: 'Home', routerLink: '/' }, { label: 'Cart', routerLink: '/add-cart' }, { label: 'Contact', routerLink: '/contact' } ]; this.loadCartCount(); } loadCartCount() { const data = localStorage.getItem("cart"); if (data) { this.cartCountChange = JSON.parse(data).length; } } filterProducts() { this.productService.filterProducts(this.searchValue); } }
